content:
An experimental cli platform in zig : https://github.com/travisstaloch/roc-cli-platform-zig

Anyone who wants to use a zig platform is welcome to try it out. I've only tested it against my, @Brendan Hansknecht's and @Ghislain's advent of code solutions. So its certainly missing a lot of features compared to the rust cli platform.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas / suggestions / requests please post here or create an issue.
